New Records: South Africa recorded the lowest total successfully defended in the T20 World Cup history (113/6)
Key Match Events: Keshav Maharaj defended 10 runs in the final over to help South Africa win
Tanzid Hasan and Taskin Ahmed's Powerplay burst
Critical wickets taken by Rishad Hossain and Keshav Maharaj in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and opted to bat first
Bangladesh's bowlers were expected to perform well
Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller were key players for South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa players expressed pride in their resilience
Bangladesh's bowlers were praised for their performance
The win boosted South Africa's confidence for the Super 8 spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York
The pitch conditions were challenging but suitable for bowlers
